storyInfo: Given his current situation, Leontuzzo decides to grit his teeth and wait things out. Texas is interrogated. Lappland receives a call from her father, but has plans of her own.

attributes.content: Where am I...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Oh, you're finally awake.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: This is... home?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Demetri, why are you here?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Lavinia brought you back.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: According to the doctor, you passed out due to a combination of your injuries and fatigue.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Want an apple?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I knew you'd be hungry, so I already peeled it for you.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Where's Lavinia?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: She left after delivering you to the guards.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You should know by now that she's always been reluctant to set foot inside this mansion.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Her coming here for your sake is already a miracle in itself.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Carracci's death is actually a bit of an issue.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: And news of your injury is sure to get out.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: In the eyes of the other famiglie, the Bellones have, in a heartbeat, gone from the clear frontrunner to a total mess, both inside and out.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Someone could show up at any moment to try to take a bite out of us.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Did we keep any of the assailants alive long enough to get them to talk?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Unfortunately, no.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: And we couldn't find any leads on their bodies either.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I expected as much.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Any idea who could be behind this?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The Saluzzos always kept their cards close to their chests, biding their time. For them, this is a prime opportunity.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: As for the Rossatis... They're probably victims too, since Wallach was with me when they attacked.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Still, Columbia's famiglie have never been a monolith.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: True, there's always the possibility of infighting among them.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Besides, there are even more possibilities.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Tch, they sure found themselves a nice opening.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Mind pouring me some water?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You bastard, barking out even more orders than usual when you're lying in bed.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Did... you really just pour me a cup of boiling water?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Is it my fault your order wasn't specific enough?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Alright fine, I know this is how you express your dissatisfaction with me. What is it this time?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: It's about the arrangement with Texas. I can't agree to it.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Lavinia is a righteous person who would never frame an innocent. She has her own ideas.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: That's not what I meant. She was supposed to be your sword.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: When the boss handed her over to you, that came with the assurance that she would not endanger the famiglia.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You should've forged her into a razor-sharp blade.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But now, she's behind bars under Lavinia's watch.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You seriously can't tell that she's looking out for our famiglia's interests?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I'll admit, holding onto Texas after today would only make things more precarious for you.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: That her surname has appeared once more in Siracusa... draws far too much attention.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: In that sense, you have a point. From Lavinia's perspective, it's safer to have Texas in hand.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: But how is the rest of our famiglia supposed to see this?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: They'll start to think that Leontuzzo, the next don of Famiglia Bellone, has gotten addicted to playing house on top of the tablecloth. That you've gone soft.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: That not only do you not know how to swing a knife, you got it taken away from you.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The Bellones already lost the advantage. No matter who comes looking for trouble, we need to fight back tooth and nail.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Leon, the development of Volsinii's new district is more than the humdrum business of il Ministero dei Lavori Pubblici. It should be under Bellone control.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: So that's what you really wanted to say to me.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I also have my own plans, Demetri.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Let's hear them, then.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Alright, fratello. You are my trusted advisor.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: When I got attacked, I already had the feeling that things weren't adding up. And after hearing about Carracci's death, that became even more clear.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You just asked me who I suspected could be behind this.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I don't actually think it's a Saluzzo or a Rossati.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Why's that?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: The hitmen knew me all too well.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: They knew exactly how to hit our Famiglia with speed and precision, while targeting me at the same time.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: So, what you're saying is—
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I'm going to lock myself indoors for the next few days.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I need to recover from my wounds.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: If people think we're fumbling in disarray, then let them think that.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Until the true enemy shows their tail.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: So you let Lavinia take Texas on purpose.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: As for how she wants to play her hand, that's for her to decide.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: In the meantime, there will no doubt be a slew of attacks on our famiglia.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Pay close attention to whoever's scheming behind the scenes.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: ...Understood.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: So, was that a good enough answer for you?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Since you have a clear plan in mind, naturally I'll help you put it into action.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You are, after all, the boss here.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: That's what I want to hear.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Don't let me down, Demetri.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Hello, Wallach? It's me.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Leon, I heard you were injured. How are you doing?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: We need to talk about what happened earlier today.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I'd imagine... you probably have something to ask me too. About that name.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: ...'Texas.'
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Volsinii Prison
So, you were held up at the time.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Who was holding you up?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: An old acquaintance.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Awfully convenient for them to show up just then, don't you think?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You're pretty used to being in this kind of situation, aren't you?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Back in Lungmen, I'd sometimes let myself get interrogated like this.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Lungmen, huh...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Anyway, I'd have no reason to do anything like that.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: That's what they all say.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: To be honest, though, I don't think you could've been the perpetrator, Cellinia. I can't imagine it would've done you any good.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Also, Leon contacted me beforehand and gave me a few reasons why I should trust you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: So that's why you showed up at a venue where so many important figures were present. It was originally prepared as a stage for you by Famiglia Bellone.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: However, given the current circumstances, our best option is for me to keep you here.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You're protecting Leontuzzo.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I'm protecting you as well, Texas.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Also... this may divert the attention of the other famiglie. They will be speculating what Bellone's next move will be after getting hit like this.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: And those suspicions... might loosen some of the fetters around my ankles.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Are you really a judge?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Why would you ask that?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You seem to know a lot about how the famiglie operate.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I am, in fact, a judge.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But to be good at this job in Siracusa, you need to know how the mafiosi keep themselves alive, even better than they do.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Even if I'd rather not know.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You misunderstood me. It's not at all surprising that a law enforcement official would know a thing or two about the people you're enforcing it on.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: But what I meant was that judges like you didn't exist back in the old Siracusa.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Don't get the wrong idea, Cellinia Texas.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I didn't bring you here because of the so-called checks and balances among the famiglie. Outsiders may interpret my stance as such, but I couldn't care less.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You just arrived in this city, and you still don't understand how important Ministro Carracci really was.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: He was an outstanding person. He could've made the new city under construction something far better.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It wasn't just another project to expand his business, either. He wanted to make it possible for the citizens to enjoy a new way of life.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But he's dead now.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: And I will find his murderer and bring them to justice.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: They think they can dispose of the people who refuse to bend the knee one after another, as if they were puppets.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But I will make them realize that they are not tossing away a broken doll. They are murdering living, flesh-and-blood people.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: So, Carracci's death had nothing to do with you.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And you didn't find out who the murderer was.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Pretty much.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And the task I gave you, to investigate exactly why Bellone decided to bring back Texas? No leads there either?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You never miss a beat, my dear father.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And despite having accomplished nothing at all, you didn't even bother showing up when I called to convene a meeting.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: The traffic is pretty bad this time of year.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Lappland, when I kicked you out of the house seven years ago, you lost your right to call yourself a Saluzzo. Do you understand what that means?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Of course I do. It means you won't show any mercy when you decide to dispose of a disobedient tool like me.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You've always been so self-aware, yet never have the slightest inclination to act accordingly.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Do you really need me to personally deliver a little warning to the poor little Judgie?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Why would I feel a need to warn her?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Now that the princeling pup is hiding behind closed doors, everybody's gonna think the sharp-tongued little Judgie is a Bellone puppet.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And with your personality, you aren't inclined to believe that the Bellones are as weak as they present.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: So wouldn't it be common sense to use the judge's well-being to test the waters?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Seeing how you understand what to do, I want to see results.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Why naturally, I'd never disobey your orders. Assuming our interests align, that is.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: My dearest father.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Salvadore! What are we to do now?!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Am I to thank you for freeing me from the clutches of my own blood relative? Am I to thank you for spilling blood so that the Infected workers may have full stomachs?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: The man you killed was my father!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: No, I do not need a list of his crimes. I should think I know them better than you. The scars on our bodies are proof of his cruelty. The deaths of those laborers were proof of his exploitation.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But still, despite it all!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Salvadore, I truly thank you from the bottom of my heart, for saving me and so many others.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: But the stench of blood lingering about you grows stronger and stronger...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Let us be away from this place, Salvadore, just the two of us... Take me somewhere we will at last be able to find peace, alright?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: It might already be too late.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Salvadore, it might already have been too late the day you first set foot in Columbia, from when you first sharpened your blade...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: You say this was all destined? That it couldn't have been avoided?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I can't help but think... If I were in Vivienne's place, would I be able to forgive Salvadore?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Even if what he did could be forgiven, the grudge would follow the both of them for the rest of their lives.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Exactly right, signorina.
Huh?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That the two of them were able to get together in the end is, of course, artistic license.
In fact, the real Salvadore did not elope with Vivienne.

Also, despite the fact that Vivienne's father was indeed as callous as he was wealthy, he took good care of his family - particularly Vivienne, whom he doted on like a diamond in the palm of his hand.
Oh...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Very rarely is someone pure evil, don't you think?
Therefore, even if the perpetrator was someone you loved dearly, even if you were aware of your father's despicable acts, something like what he did is not so easily forgiven.
Signorina Vivienne ultimately chose to leave him and move to a new city, where she met someone who truly loved her and thus began a new life.
But, until her last breath, she never forgot the man named Salvadore.
So in a sense, this story can be seen as vicariously helping her dream come true.
Did you... know Ms Vivienne well?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Hmm... I suppose you could say that.
My name is Caterina. You're quite the lovely young actress.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Are you new here? I swing by frequently, but I've never seen your face before.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: I am. My name is Sora, and I came from Lungmen.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Lungmen? How fascinating.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: I've heard of many actors who went to Lungmen to develop their careers, but rarely the other way around.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Sometimes, there's value in bucking the trend.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Too true.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: So Miss Caterina, do you know what happened to the actual Ms Vivienne?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Vivienne, huh... She never forgot Salvadore.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Maybe that's why her son chose a similar path— he became a wise guy, and gradually rose to become the don of a certain famiglia.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: A famiglia that would eventually go on to clash against Salvadore himself.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Fortunately, Vivienne came forward and prevented the two rivals from becoming mortal enemies, and eventually they even became allies.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Wait, are you talking about the Rossati Family from the script?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: That's right. Have you already read through the entire thing?
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Yes... I also wanted to learn as much as I could about the Texas Family's history, for some personal reasons.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: So what did you think of the story?
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: I... There are a few bits I can't make sense of.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Oh? For example?
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: For example, Salvadore's granddaughter...
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Sora, the stylist wants you to take a look at the design of your costume!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Okay, I'll be right there!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Sorry, but I have to go.
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: I don't mind. We'll have another chance to talk.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Sora—
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Take your time. We can always chat at our leisure some other day.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Okay, that's great!
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: Salvadore's granddaughter.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: You're wasting time at the theater again, boss.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: How many times do I have to tell you, Wallach? It's not a waste of time.
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: You pushed most of your work onto me just so you could go write a shitty play? Is that what the boss of a famiglia should be doing? And you even gave yourself a pseudonym?
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Do you have a problem with that?
attributes.name: Caterina

attributes.content: Of course not. You are none other than Giovanna Rossati, our beloved Donna.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I know you're dissatisfied with me.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Is there really anything in this city worth worrying over?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Before, no. But now, yes.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Carracci is dead.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: But Carracci was originally just a ordinary man, elevated by the famiglie to keep each other in check.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: All his death proves is that Bellone was not capable enough, nothing more.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: And someone greatly resembling Cellinia appeared at Leontuzzo's side.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Say that again?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Texas. Cellinia Texas.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Wallach, I don't recall you being the sort of man who liked to crack jokes.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: And you should also know that I hate people who joke about Texas more than anything else.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: So you can tell I'm not joking.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: I have no idea how Bellone managed to find her, but she had those unmistakable eyes and hair.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Exactly like the one in your photo.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: So she didn't die...
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: And she's with Leontuzzo now.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: She would never have survived the liquidation if not for a certain famiglia protecting her.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: ...The logical conclusion is that Bellone saved her back then.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Looks like we're going to need to have a little chat.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Giovanna, this clearly is a trap—
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Wallach.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: ...My apologies, boss.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: It's not so much a 'trap' as an entire conspiracy.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Think bigger.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: If they really were the ones who saved her back then, what good does it do me to drop by and express my gratitude?
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Make preparations. 'Business discussions' are over. I'm paying Volsinii a visit.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Understood. I'll make the arrangements.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: Alas, it seems that the new script will have to go on the backburner for a while.
attributes.name: Giovanna

attributes.content: Boss, I'm sure you're aware that Carracci's death presents an excellent opportunity for us.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: But you still seem hung up on the Texas name.
attributes.name: Wallach

attributes.content: If this keeps up, the Rossatis won't have a future.
attributes.name: Wallach
